CustomField.description: This field is not applicable to deals with Job Type = Creditor Advisor and should be populated with N/A, otherwise, a yes or no is needed in this field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For Creditor, use N/A. Does the debtor/issuer have any securities or other financial instruments that are admitted/pending to trade on any EU regulated market or any multi-lateral trading facility in the EU?
CustomField.label: Does the Company have EU Securities?
